product_description: shiny pink skin friendly pillow in rectangle shape, 60 cm x 30 cm

copy_data.primary_copy: Sleep in pure comfort with our dreamy pink pillow. Gentle on skin, perfect support for your best rest. Sweet dreams await!
copy_data.headline: The Softest Touch For Sweeter Dreams
copy_data.description: Experience cloud-like comfort with our skin-friendly pink pillow. Perfectly sized for versatile support, with a modern design that elevates any space.

claude_optimized_prompt: A luxurious bedroom scene with a shiny pink rectangular pillow on a crisp white bed, soft natural light streaming through sheer curtains, creating a dreamy atmosphere. Modern minimalist decor, muted pastel accents. Pillow positioned at golden ratio, leaving space for text. Photorealistic commercial photography style, 8K quality.

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A luxurious bedroom scene with a shiny pink rectangular pillow on a crisp white bed, set against soft natural light streaming through sheer white curtains. The atmosphere is dreamy and tranquil, accentuated by modern minimalist decor with muted pastel accents. The shiny pillow is prominently placed on the bed following the golden ratio. The room conveys photorealistic commercial photography style quality, designed to leave space around the pillow for overlaying text. Photographed in 8K resolution for high-end detail.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: A luxurious bedroom scene with a shiny pink rectangular pillow on a crisp white bed, soft natural light streaming through sheer curtains, creating a dreamy atmosphere. Modern minimalist decor, muted pastel accents. Pillow positioned at golden ratio, leaving space for text. Photorealistic commercial photography style, 8K quality.
